feed.title: Appwrite Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add new collection by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8832
  • Move functions endpoints to modules by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8839
  • Fix workers by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8842
  • fix: builds worker new structure by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8843
  • feat: static runtime by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8849
  • Add secret attribute to variables by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8831
  • fix: commands and todos by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8852
  • Add new endpoints in HTTP structure by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8844
  • Feat: Static sites by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8860
  • Add custom domain param in create site endpoint by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8865
  • Add timeout and add sites scopes by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8863
  • Fix: leftover structure by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8872
  • Use compute vars for functions and sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8873
  • Add build and serve runtime to updateSite by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8875
  • Feat: Implement preview deployments by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8877
  • Fix: unwanted notice by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8878
  • Throw exception for error by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8879
  • Fix: deployment domain incorrect by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8880
  • Fix: sites deployment logs realtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8882
  • Feat: Styled&timestamped logs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8883
  • Fix: sites get template missing key by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8884
  • Feat add sites comments by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8885
  • Create preview url rule when deployment is created by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9001
  • Add _APP_DOMAIN_SITES to console variables by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9010
  • Add fallbackFile for SPA by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8995
  • Change case to sentence case for site template titles by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9030
  • Logs for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9047
  • Feat: Server-side rendering for site frameworks by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9033
  • Feat bulk deletes by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8942
  • Feat bulk updates by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8955
  • Feat: Bulk Create Documents by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8968
  • Feat new sdk label by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9108
  • Feat create documents sdk by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9086
  • Delete rules when site or deployment is deleted by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8939
  • Fix: Sites manual QA by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9193
  • Add tests for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9182
  • Chore: Deprecate markdown docs refferences by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9307
  • Chore: Improve tsts by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9324
  • Add secret param to update variable endpoint by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9322
  • Add new console endpoint to check resource availability by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8970
  • Feat: preview branding by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9326
  • Fix: Site CORS by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9359
  • Feat: Template deployments by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9364
  • Move rule creation to create rule by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9352
  • Add createVcsDeployment endpoints for sites and functions by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9380
  • Fix: Improve tests OPR setup by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9382
  • Feat: Site screenshots by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9366
  • Chore: Remove subquery by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9405
  • Feat: Enhance rules by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9395
  • Fix: deviceForSites by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9407
  • Feat: SPA support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9314
  • Move function endpoints from controller to modules by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9416
  • Feat: Build download endpoint in Functions by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9419
  • Chore: Add SSR logs test by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9421
  • Feat: Screenshot task for templates by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9417
  • Chore: Combine download endpoints by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9434
  • Add resource type label in sites endpoints by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9432
  • Chore: Rename deployment activate endpoint by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9436
  • Chore: Migrate redeploy endpoint by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9445
  • Chore: Move cancel build to update deployment status by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9455
  • Feat: Reuse Node runtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9463
  • Feat: Merge specs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9469
  • Chore Remove builds collection by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9457
  • Feat: Authorized previews by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9357
  • Integrate detection library with Appwrite by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9315
  • Chore: 2nd rules rehaul by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9461
  • Fix: site tests by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9474
  • Truncate commit message to 252 characters by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9433
  • Add get and list template tests for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9483
  • Feat: OPR v5 by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9485
  • Chore: Attribute name consistency by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9484
  • Avoid code repetition in workers and tasks by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9490
  • Throw build error for adapter mismatch by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9492
  • Improve params readability by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9500
  • Fix github comment by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9504
  • Fix: Realtime events in build worker by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9519
  • Fix: Response model for framework (adapters) by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9522
  • Feat: totalSize attribute by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9524
  • Feat: Add screenshots to site by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9532
  • Fix incorrect URL for git commits by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9535
  • Feat: Active deployment details - status, creation date by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9534
  • Feat: Latest deployment details by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9537
  • Re-enable test by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9550
  • Split params across multiple lines where overflowing by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9551
  • Fix GitHub check URL by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9549
  • Add fallbackfile and adapter to deployments collection by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9570
  • Add logging param to sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9576
  • Feat: Bash support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9575
  • If build has failed, show correct error page by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9569
  • Fix: Deployment status by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9580
  • Feat fix 308 redirect by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9553
  • feat: add query by role to memberships by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9503
  • Feat: A/AAA record support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9627
  • Chore add test for empty source by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9542
  • Add tests for empty output directory by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9566
  • Fix: usage stats changes by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9597
  • Design nice looking error pages by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9606
  • Feat: CSV Import by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9622
  • Fix deployment and executions deletion by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9660
  • Add resourceId by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9662
  • Feat sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8859
  • Update: specs by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9663
  • Allow compressed CSV by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9673
  • Development Keys by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8378
  • Feat: tokens by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8997
  • Feat add favicon to error pages by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9672
  • Chore separate benchmark in ci/cd by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9664
  • Feat: Add playground templates by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9676
  • Chore: updated utopia migration version by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9677
  • feat(users): synchronously delete identities and targets in controller by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9689
  • Chore: Database migration preparations by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9698
  • Move specification into SDK namespace by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9478
  • Feat pool adapter by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9659
  • Revert "Feat pool adapter" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9703
  • Add: Source report method by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9709
  • Expose var by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9710
  • fix: tokens module by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9702
  • Update console indexes by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9618
  • Set type in createDuplicateDeployment by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9699
  • tasks: clean all Timers on error & shutdown by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9727
  • Fix: FileTokens by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9678
  • chore: add harden create email token endpoint by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9724
  • chore: update utopia database to 0.67.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9729
  • refactor: maintenance task to run at a specific time by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9734
  • Feat bulk operations by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9065
  • chore: introduce class attribute to oauth2 config by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9737
  • Fix request filters with multi-method routes by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9743
  • feat(scheduling): add telemetry for scheduler tasks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9721
  • fix(schedules): enqueue delay telemetry in wrong format by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9749
  • fix(schedules): better error handling by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9751
  • Fix indexes for 1.7.x by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9752
  • Feat/index length by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9748
  • fix(schedules): disable coroutine until we have proper pool support by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9759
  • feat: inforu adapter by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9620
  • Fix databases usage metrics by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9760
  • chore: improve route not found error message by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9733
  • Sync 1.6.2 into main by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9755
  • feat: telemetry for storage devices by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9761
  • feat: plan based email logoUrl by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9745
  • Update tokens without JWT by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9750
  • Swap default image quality to -1, keeping source image quality. by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9766
  • feat: add ability to generate client and server sdks by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9747
  • Fix owner role downgrade by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9765
  • Fix infinie loop in delete project by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9726
  • Only rethrow auth and timeout in general handler by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9767
  • Fix scopes by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9768
  • Create unique stable cache identifier by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9769
  • Update README.md by @LauraDuRy in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9771
  • chore: update storage library by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9776
  • fix(storage): do not preview gif input/output by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9777
  • Fix specs by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9774
  • 1.7.x ce migration by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9738
  • Sync 1.6.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9778
  • chore: update request response filters for 1.7.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9770
  • Feat 1.7 SDKs by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9780
  • Set version to RC1 by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9781
  • Add RC version to migration by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9782
  • Fix length by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9783
  • Release 1.6.2 by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9784
  • fix: prevent appwrite-task-stats-resources from crashing by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9786
  • chore: update sdk versions and changelog by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9790
  • Chore sync 1.6.x by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9787
  • Remove telemetry by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9791
  • Update console by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9792
  • Fix class name by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9793
  • Update version by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9795
  • fix: remove builds by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9788
  • Sync 1.6.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9796
  • Chore review fixes by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9797
  • Update console by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9798
  • 1.7.x by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.6.2...1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: request response formats for 1.7.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9801
  • Fix: domain validaiton by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9802
  • Fix: backwards compatibility for function creation by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9804
  • Fix: site env vars at runtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9805
  • Feat: bypass gateway by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9806
  • Chore: update domains by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9808
  • Fix: logic of chunk reading by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9810

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove: search to maintain document structure by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9812
  • Chore: upgrade detection, executor and console by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9816
  • fix: task coroutine hooks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9814
  • fix: task coroutine hooks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9815
  • fix: add _APP_DOMAIN_SITES variables.php so the env is initialized by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9825
  • certificates: add domainType to certificate worker by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9828
  • Feat pool adapter by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9757
  • Fix: flutter starter by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9830
  • fix: download endpoint by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9831
  • Update: token desc by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9820
  • Chore: Upgrade console by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9833
  • Feat: Add lynx gallery by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9835
  • Catch query exception on get document for selects by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9834
  • Upsert single document route by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9811
  • Fix migrating functions with no deployments by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9829
  • Merge 1.7.x into main by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9840
  • Merge pull request #9811 from ArnabChatterjee20k/upsert-single-docume… by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9843
  • feat: add dev key to clients by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9837
  • Append build error to build logs by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9836
  • Append build error to build logs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9844
  • Prepare 1.7.2 release by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9826
  • added checking for encrypt and plan allowing encryption of string att… by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9841
  • Sync 1.7.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9846
  • Sync 1.6.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9845
  • fix: allow devkeys header to pass CORS by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9848
  • Fix: double logs on failure by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9852

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.1...1.7.2

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Only load error page for development mode by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9860
  • fix: send deploymentResourceType in rules verification by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9859
  • Fix: CNAME validation by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9861
  • Fix bucket not included in path by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9864
  • Add configurable deployment and build size by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9863
  • Fix: unlimited deployment size by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9866
  • chore: update flutter_web_auth_2 docs to match 4.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9858
  • chore: use unique filename for health check by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9842
  • added encrypt property in the attribute string response model by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9868
  • Feat sequence by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9865
  • feat: add builds worker group by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9873
  • Fix URL for view logs in github comment by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9875
  • updated errro for the string encryption by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9878
  • Revert "Feat sequence" by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9879
  • fix(migration): set owner and region while migrating rules by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9856
  • Bump console to version 6.0.11 by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9881
  • Prepare 1.7.3 release by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9882
  • fix(migration): _APP_DEFAULT_REGION is not a valid env var by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9883

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.2...1.7.3

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: Upgrade to fix createDeployment chunk upload by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9886
  • Update version from 1.7.3 to 1.7.4 by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9893
  • Update console image to version 6.0.13 by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9891

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.3...1.7.4
